clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficiency and Safety of Sodium Bicarbonate on Uric Acid in Patients With Asymptomatic Hyperuricemia or Gout
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficiency and Safety of Sodium Bicarbonate on Uric Acid in Patients With Asymptomatic Hyperuricemia or Gout

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluate the serum uric acid lowering effect of sodium bicarbonate as well as its safety in patients with asymptomatic hyperuricemia or gout. Half of the participants will receive sodium bicarbonate only, while the other half receive none.

primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline serum levels of uric acid at 1 month

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline fraction excretion of uric acid at 1 month

intervention.description: Sodium Bicarbonate was given 1g tid for one month

responsible_party.investigator_title: Chief, Professor, Department of Rheumatology, Shanghai Zhongshan Hospital
